text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer! Thank you for coming!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Greetings! This is the Umamusume 
Archive, where records of your 
trainees'careers are stored.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
All the days you spend getting to know 
each other, the days you spend training...

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
The more memories you make, the higher 
your Archive level will become.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Raising this level comes with its own 
rewards, so you'd do well to work your 
hardest!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
As the overseer of the Archive, 
please let me know if there's anything 
you need.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Correct! All the rewards have been 
entrusted to Tazuna, so you'll be 
collecting them from her. That's all 
from me!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, please work hard to make 
plenty of wonderful memories. â™ª

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
I'll also be waiting with great 
anticipation to see the amazing 
Archive you make. Ha-ha-ha!
